name: Sandy Beach Wedding
description: At Southernmost Weddings we know that it can be challenging for you to plan a destination beach wedding in Key West. So, we have a variety of beach wedding packages at beautiful Florida Keys locations all with affordable rates.

name: Private Sailboat Wedding
description: Planning a romantic Key West wedding on the waters of the Gulf of Mexico? Imagine sailing into the sunset as you say I Do and toast the start of your new life together. A wedding cruise on a schooner or catamaran is a great way to get married in Florida.

name: Intimate Garden Wedding
description: Affordable tropical garden wedding packages at just the right price. Are you looking to get married in a tropical garden in Key West or the Florida Keys, then we have a variety of different garden wedding packages to fit your budget?

name: Romantic Elopement Wedding
description: If you're knee-deep in wedding planning and feeling stressed out or frazzled from juggling all of the decisions, you may be thinking, 'Maybe we should just elope' Given the high cost of a wedding and the ease of eloping, this might be an option worth considering.

name: Key West Wedding & Honeymoon Packages
description: ake the guessing game out of wedding & honeymoon planning with our All-Inclusive Wedding Packages, each destination wedding comes with a 3 Nights stay in a Beautiful Award-Winning Hotel or Guesthouse.

name: All-inclusive Beach Wedding & Reception Packages
description: Our wedding planners have created a variety of All-inclusive wedding and reception packages to fit every budget. These packages include everything you need for a stress-free wedding and a delicious dinner, buffet, or cocktail party afterwards.
